item.title: What web development language should I learn in 2017
item.description: Recently I saw this question on Quora: “I used to develop in PHP/MySQL about 4 years back. I understand that PHP is no longer a good choice. I would like to get back in developing dynamic websites/web apps again. What language/framework do you suggest I should learn which will also be useful in coming years? Thank you.” My answer is below: There are many languages you can use for web development.
